title: Remco Evenepoel Revisits Site of Horrific 2020 Lombardia Crash: ‘It’s Not the Nicest Feeling to be Here’
content:
Belgian star turns page on crash that nearly nipped his promising career in the bud: 'I think it’s good to close the chapter and the story about this crash.'

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel Revisits Site of Horrific 2020 Lombardia Crash: ‘It’s Not the Nicest Feeling to be Here’ on Velo.
